contentrichtext.text: {{no footnotes|date=March 2013}} {{Infobox person | name = Zoe Telford | image = | birth_name = Zoe Telford | birth_date = {{Birth year and age|1973}} | birth_place = [[Norwich]], [[England]] | occupation = Actress | spouse = | awards = }} '''Zoe Telford''' is an [[English People|English]] [[actress]]. ==Early life== She grew up in [[Norwich]]. Her mother is Leila Telford. ==Career== ===Television=== Telford has appeared in the following: ''[[Absolute Power (comedy)|Absolute Power]]'', ''[[Teachers (UK TV series)|Teachers]]'', ''[[Agatha Christie's Poirot]] - [[Death on the Nile (2004 film)|Death on the Nile]]'', ''[[Afterlife (TV series)|Afterlife]]'', ''[[Law & Order UK]]'', ''[[Cutting It]]'', ''[[The Golden Hour]]'', ''[[Lewis (TV series)|Lewis]]'', ''[[Agatha Christie's Marple]] - [[The Sittaford Mystery]]'', as [[Eva Braun]] in ''[[Hitler: The Rise of Evil]]'', as Abigail Thomas in ''[[The Palace (TV series)|The Palace]]'', as Anna Klein in ''[[Criminal Justice (TV series)|Criminal Justice]]'', as Sandra Rampton in ''[[Collision (TV series)|Collision]]'', as Marianne Swift, a freelance ''[[Daily Mail]]'' journalist in ''[[The Thick of It]]'', as a criminal in a sixth series episode of ''[[Foyle's War]]'' and in 2010, she had a role in ''[[Ashes to Ashes (TV series)|Ashes to Ashes]]'' as an undercover police officer, and a role as Sarah, a doctor, in ''[[Sherlock (TV series)|Sherlock]]'' as a romantic interest of Dr. Watson. In 2013 she is [[Claire Sutton (Yes Prime Minister)|Claire Sutton]], special advisor to Jim Hacker in ''[[Yes, Prime Minister]]'', the revival of the political comedy. In June 2013 she played Michelle Paradise in hit ITV drama [[Love and Marriage (2013 TV series)]] ==Film== She has been in such films as ''[[Match Point]]'', ''[[Deuce Bigalow: European Gigolo]]'', ''[[The Waiting Room (2008 film)|The Waiting Room]]'', ''[[The Truth (2006 film)|The Truth]]'', and ''[[The Painted Veil (2006 film)|The Painted Veil]]''. ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== * {{imdb name|0854364|Zoe Telford}} <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]] --> {{Persondata |NAME = Telford, Zoe |ALTERNATIVE NAMES = |SHORT DESCRIPTION = British actress of film and television |DATE OF BIRTH = 1973 |PLACE OF BIRTH = [[Norwich]], [[England]] |DATE OF DEATH = |PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Telford, Zoe}} [[Category:1973 births]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:British television actors]] [[Category:People from Norwich]] {{UK-screen-actor-stub}}
